items.description: 20 varieties of sausages made in-store with fresh meat, hand-mixed spices, and natural casings. Most are gluten-free and nitrate-free. We also offer beef, chicken, lamb, bison, and breakfast sausages along with 10 types of gourmet burgers.
Locally raised, antibiotic-free pork. Includes popular single and double smoked bacon.
Sustainable, hormone-free beef from Tweed, ON. Cattle are raised on farm-grown grass and grains. Also offers AA & AAA quality Western Canada beef.
Fresh lamb sourced weekly from Millgrove, ON. Limited availability, pre-order recommended.
Wide variety of local and specialty deli meats and charcuterie options.
Ethically cured meats made with natural ingredients, sourced locally from Ottawa.
High-quality charcuterie products, including bresaola and summer salami, from Kingston, ON.
Diverse selection of fresh, homemade meals prepared weekly by our chefs using in-store products. Includes soups, sauces, chili, and meals like Butter Chicken and Chicken Pesto Pasta.
Specialty cheeses from Montebello, Quebec, as well as imported selections from England and France.
Fresh cheese curds made daily in Gatineau.
Ottawa-based bakery offering high-quality artisan breads, including baguettes, sourdough, and seed breads.
Fresh baguettes, French breads, and pastries delivered daily from Ottawa’s Byward Market.
Handcrafted breads, including French bread and rye, made fresh daily in Ottawa.
White and whole wheat pita bread delivered fresh three times a week.
Locally made sourdough breads such as Jalapeño & Cheddar, Garlic & Rosemary, and Everything Bagel. Naturally fermented for 72 hours.
Daily fresh fruits and vegetables. Stocks seasonal Ontario and Quebec produce whenever possible.
100% pure Canadian maple syrup from Balderson, ON. Produced using traditional wood fire techniques.
Locally made fresh honey, creamed honey, and cinnamon honey from Gloucester, ON.
Handcrafted chocolate made in Almonte, ON, with ethically sourced cacao beans.
High-quality chocolate made in the Outaouais region, serving gourmet tastes for over 10 years.
Handcrafted hot sauces made from homegrown peppers, blending flavors from various cultures.
Premium mixers made with all-natural ingredients, designed to complement fine spirits.
A variety of organic and natural products, plus everyday essentials. Customer suggestions welcomed.
Ottawa-based coffee roaster sourcing high-quality beans from small farmers worldwide.
Locally roasted fair-trade coffee with distinct, elegant flavors.
Handcrafted, freshly roasted coffee from Huntsville, Ontario.
Organic coffee imported from the Intag valley in Ecuador, supporting local farmers resisting mining.
Coffee alternative made with organic Reishi mushrooms, promoting energy and stress relief without caffeine crashes.
